parameters.prompt:
Generate an inventory alert report based on this data:

Out of Stock: {{ $json.summary.outOfStock }} items
Low Stock: {{ $json.summary.lowStock }} items
Total Reorder Value: ${{ $json.summary.reorderValue.toFixed(2) }}

Critical Items:
{{ $json.summary.criticalItems.map(item => `- ${item.name} (${item.sku}): ${item.currentStock} units`).join('\n') }}

High Priority Items:
{{ $json.summary.highPriorityItems.slice(0, 5).map(item => `- ${item.name} (${item.sku}): ${item.currentStock}/${item.minThreshold} units`).join('\n') }}

Create a professional inventory alert that:
1. Summarizes the situation
2. Highlights critical items
3. Provides reorder recommendations
4. Suggests immediate actions
5. Includes financial impact

Keep it concise and actionable.

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { success: $json.success, transactionId: $json.transactionId, sku: $json.sku, previousStock: $json.previousStock, newStock: $json.newStock, alertLevel: $json.alertLevel, alertMessage: $json.alertMessage || 'Stock updated successfully' } }}
